name: Casa Magna - Liga F - Petit Corona
additionalNotes: Manuel Quesada Jr, cigar-legend and master blender behind many top-rated and award winning cigars has created a stronger version of Casa Magna aptly naming it Casa Magna Liga F. Using an Ecuadorian sun grown corojo wrapper over a Dominican binder and fillers from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua, a full-bodied profile was created.  Rich notes of natural sweetness, earth, wood, cocoa, and pepper.
